game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits who have taken over the old windmill on the outskirts of town. They have been stealing food and supplies from the villagers, leaving many without.
game.objective: Help the villagers of Oakwood by clearing out the bandits from the old windmill.

tasks.description: Gather information about the bandits' movements and numbers.
tasks.objective: Talk to the villagers and gather information.

tasks.description: Infiltrate the old windmill and take out the bandit leader.
tasks.objective: Defeat Grimgar Ironfist, the bandit leader.

game.title: Cleaning Out the Windmill
